title: Retool: Excel-like, with higher order primitives
author: dvdhsu
content: retool twitter facebook build tools minutes, days. live demo below. build own tool explore data instantly, the docs. live demo docs prebuilt views need table all users? drag on. , write sql query, just tell table pull data the query. done! interactive to search users table? drag a textinput widget, make sql query listen its value string interpolation. search box done -- seconds. auth + audit logs coming soon: share pages amongst yoru organization, see viewed , did actions, etc. try now!
